Header: Miss Universe, Bollywood divas attend beauty pageant in Mumbai
Content: Reuters â€“ Finale of the beauty pageant Miss Diva Universe 2018 was a star-studded night on Friday (August 31) with Miss Universe Demi-Leigh Nel-Peters, Miss Supernatural Jenny Kim, and Bollywood divas attending the event. Actress Lara Dutta Bhupati, who was a mentor to all the 19 participants, hoped winner of the event will bring back the Miss Universe crown to India. The finale was attended by a number of celebrities including Neha Dhupia, Shilpa Shetty, Malaika Arora Khan. The winner will represent India at the 67th Miss Universe 2018 pageant to be held in Bangkok in December.
